subject: Speedskating
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The American J. R. Celski become the first short-track speedskater to break the 40-second barrier in the 500 meters, setting a world record of 39.973 seconds in a World Cup final in Calgary, Alberta.
snippet: The American J. R. Celski become the first short-track speedskater to break the 40-second barrier in the 500 meters, setting a world record of 39.973 seconds in a World Cup final in Calgary, Alberta.
